deleteDialog.title: Delete Project
deleteDialog.message: Are you sure you want to delete the project "{{projectName}}"? This action is irreversible and will remove all associated data.

empty.title: No projects found
empty.message: Create your first project to start using MsgCore

about.title: About Projects
about.description: Projects in MsgCore completely isolate your data and settings. Each project has its own API keys, members, connected platforms, and message history. Select a project to work with it.

errors.loadError: Error loading projects. Please try again.
